name: Memory Target vs Memory Usage
description: The PromQL query compares the recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) for memory target usage with the actual memory usage of each container.
question: What are the recommended memory target usage values provided by the VPA?

name: Memory Target vs Memory Usage
description: The PromQL query compares the recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) for memory target usage with the actual memory usage of each container.
question: How does the actual memory usage of each container compare to the recommended target usage?

name: Memory Target vs Memory Usage
description: The PromQL query compares the recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) for memory target usage with the actual memory usage of each container.
question: Are there any containers exceeding the recommended memory target usage?

name: VPA Memory Recommendations vs Requests and Limits
description: The PromQL query measures the memory recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) and compares them to the memory requests and limits of all containers in a pod.
question: How does the memory recommendation from VPA compare to the memory requests of containers?

name: VPA Memory Recommendations vs Requests and Limits
description: The PromQL query measures the memory recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) and compares them to the memory requests and limits of all containers in a pod.
question: Are there any containers in the pod that have memory limits set lower than the VPA recommendation?

name: VPA Memory Recommendations vs Requests and Limits
description: The PromQL query measures the memory recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) and compares them to the memory requests and limits of all containers in a pod.
question: Which containers in the pod have the highest difference between memory requests and VPA recommendations?

name: CPU Target vs CPU Usage
description: This PromQL query measures the target CPU usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) alongside the actual CPU usage of each container.
question: What are the target CPU usage recommendations suggested by the VPA?

name: CPU Target vs CPU Usage
description: This PromQL query measures the target CPU usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) alongside the actual CPU usage of each container.
question: How does the actual CPU usage of each container compare to the recommended target usage?

name: CPU Target vs CPU Usage
description: This PromQL query measures the target CPU usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) alongside the actual CPU usage of each container.
question: Which containers are exceeding the recommended CPU usage levels?
